thread.title: Squaremouth Announces The Top Travel Insurance Providers Of July, 2015
thread.title_full: Squaremouth Announces The Top Travel Insurance Providers Of July, 2015

title: Squaremouth Announces The Top Travel Insurance Providers Of July, 2015
text:
Squaremouth Announces The Top Travel Insurance Providers Of July, 2015 By PR Newswire | 08/03/15 - 05:37 PM EDT Reprint ST. PETERSBURG, Fla. , Aug. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Squaremouth , America's fastest growing travel insurance comparison site, announced its top-selling travel insurance providers of July, 2015. Top-Selling Travel Insurance Providers for July, 2015, Ranked by Premium Sold: 1 - AXA Assistance USA - $278,677.00 2 - Tin Leg - $227,878.50 3 - InsureandGo USA - $171,768.14 4 - RoamRight - $112,232.02 5 - Travel Insured International - $103,816.00 AXA Assistance USA Number of policies sold in July, 2015: 650 Total number of policies sold through Squaremouth platform: 1,235 Overall customer rating: 4.5 out of 5 Percentage of negative reviews to sales: 0.0% Tin Leg Number of policies sold in July, 2015: 878 Total number of policies sold through Squaremouth platform: 20,205 Overall customer rating: 4.36 out of 5 Percentage of negative reviews to sales: 0.3% InsureandGo USA Number of policies sold in July, 2015: 939 Total number of policies sold through Squaremouth platform: 4,373 Overall customer rating: 4.72 out of 5 Percentage of negative reviews to sales: 0.0% RoamRight Number of policies sold in July, 2015: 682 Total number of policies sold through Squaremouth platform: 16,274 Overall customer rating: 4.49 out of 5 Percentage of negative reviews to sales: 0.4% Travel Insured International Number of policies sold in July, 2015: 510 Total number of policies sold through Squaremouth platform: 45,897 Overall customer rating: 4.44 out of 5 Percentage of negative reviews to sales: 0.7% ABOUT SQUAREMOUTH: Squaremouth is an online company that compares travel insurance products from virtually every major travel insurance provider in the United States . Using Squaremouth's comparison engine and third party customer reviews, travelers can research and compare insurance products side-by-side. More information can be found at www.squaremouth. com . AVAILABLE TOPIC EXPERT : Megan Singh msingh@squaremouth.com (727) 378-0983 To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/squaremouth-announces-the-top-travel-insurance-providers-of-july-2015-300122644.html SOURCE Squaremouth Copyright 2011 PR Newswire.
